EmailTemplate.name: 201908_Global_Email_GoDirect_BGA_MC.201908_Email4_GoDirect_BGA_MC
EmailTemplate.subject: Take Back Control of Planning
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Hi, {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}} Before working with Honeywell Aerospace, the Chief Pilots we partner with had little control over how they planned their routes. Worse still, without an intelligent route forecasting the cleared-as-filed rates with air traffic control were low and time-consuming. Thanks to Honeywell’s GoDirect Flight Planning <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/flight-planning?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirectflight_bga&utm_term=email4]]> software, they took back control of planning, comparing multiple routes and cruise models – at the same time! I would love to tell you more and discuss how Honeywell Aerospace can help {{lead.Company Name:default=your company}} achieve similar results. Are you free for a brief call this week?
Best wishes,
Maggie Deane Specialist - Inside Sales GoDirect Mobile: 480-225-9416 Email: Maggie.deane@honeywell.com <[[mailto:Maggie.deane@honeywell.com]]>
